channel.title: Full romeo and juliet quest
channel.description:
my old 1 got buried and knowone cared in this 1 im giving the storyline i used
.speak with juliet to start .find romeo and ask him to marry her .ask lawerance for permission .go to apotheracy and get him cadava berries .take the potion to juliet
yay took me 3 hours and is being sold on rs-server (im not selling on mopar) if your interested pm me or put here ypur emails
